profileAlternative.name: Blaine Mincey
profileAlternative.headline: Principal Solutions Architect at MongoDB
profileAlternative.summary:
An enthusiastic and dedicated technology evangelist/sales engineer, software architect/middleware architect, and lead engineer. Outstanding communication and presentation skills coupled with technical aptitude and business acumen.

Enjoy challenges and being pushed to the limit. Very dedicated, ambitious, motivated, and incredibly driven. Have the ability to maintain a positive attitude in stressful situations.

Always looking for a good laugh, having fun, learning new things, and anything related to soccer.

Specialties:
- Java, JEE, Linux, Python, Node.js
- Open-Source technologies including JBoss, Apache Camel, Spring Framework, Spring Boot, MongoDB, etc.
- Expert in MongoDB Atlas (cloud-based DBaaS) utilizing AWS, Azure, and GCP
- Skilled in the MEAN and MERN stacks.
- Preference to Linux-based platforms (RHEL, Fedora, etc.)
- Experience with Red Hat Openshift Container Platform (OCP)

Recent achievements:
- MongoDB FY19 - 100%+ of quota
- MongoDB FY19 Excellence Club
- MongoDB FY19 SA Major Contributor

MongoDB Certifications:
- Certified Developer
- Certified DBA

positions.title: MongoDB
positions.description:
I am responsible for guiding MongoDB prospects/customers/users to design and build reliable, scalable systems using MongoDB. It is my direct responsibility to ensure customer success with the MongoDB suite of products. This includes but is not limited to software design, deployment patterns, and operational best practices. I work hand-in-hand with my sales team to develop strategy as well as play a key role in winning deals and driving business forward with the successful implementation/deployment of MongoDB.

Specifically, I assist in the design of systems, applications, and infrastructure to help drive some of the world's largest software development projects leveraging MongoDB. I advise customers on architectures, patterns, and strategies for making the best use of MongoDB. As a trusted partner, I work with the sales team to help ensure success in accounts ranging from small startups to large enterprises. I lead and deliver proof of concept (POC) implementations from concept through execution. As MongoDB is a highly technical product, I am required to translate technical concepts and patterns into business benefits for upper-level management and CxOs.

I am currently a Technical Advisor for organizations participating in the MongoDB Startup Accelerator Program.

FY19 Successes:
- Teamed with Marcelo Rocha to win the SE MongoDB SA Hackathon
- Achieved 100%+ of quota
- MongoDB FY19 Excellence Club

…
see more

Title
Sr. Solutions Architect
positions.description: Responsible for Platform, Middleware, and Cloud technologies at Red Hat.

positions.title: Senior Systems Engineer
positions.description: First pre-sales engineer at Sonatype. Technical arm of the global sales team.

positions.title: Senior Middleware Solutions Architect
positions.companyName: JBoss, a division of Red Hat
positions.description:
Provided technical credibility to JBoss sales team.

Answered technical questions given to sales team by prospective customers in the form of RFPs or RFIs.

Developed and conducted live demonstrations of JBoss products.

Educated prospects on the capabilities of JBoss software products.

Identified the appropriate technologies to solve client problems.

Collected and provided boiler plate responses to competitive FUD.

Formed relationships with clients technical staff to identify new opportunities.

Provided feedback to Product Management on product direction and feature usefulness (customer applicability).

Conducted technical screens of potential candidates.

Trained new members of the team on the JBoss product line.

Presented at various technology and Java User Groups.

Data Services Platform SME Team lead.
…
see more

positions.title: Software Developer
positions.description:
Designed, developed, and implemented SNMP diagnostic tool for use with primary application, Broadband Explorer.

Designed, developed, and implemented a JSR-181 Web Service to provide an external interface for a large cable provider.

Developed data collection routines for the purpose of adding additional customer/subscribers to reduce manual intervention.

positions.title: Senior Software Engineer
positions.description:
Assisted in the re-architecture of the primary software application, Focal Point Location Server. Implemented the Spring Framework and Hibernate Annotations to promote code reuse and code testabililty.

Designed, developed, and implemented RF monitoring software.

Responsible for the coordination of production deployments.

positions.title: Contractor (Computer Scientist)
positions.description: Provided IT consulting services through CSC for the Centers for Disease Control in Atlanta. Developed and architected solutions for Division of Healthcare and Quality Promotion (DHQP), Division of Global Migration and Quarantine (DGMQ), and the National Center for Infectious Diseases (NCID).

given.text:
Blaine and I worked closely together at Sonatype as my pre-sales engineer. He has a high level of energy, a willingness to put in long hours, and a keen eye for detail. He was able to perform and thrive under pressure and was comfortable interacting with customers, providing demonstrations for Sonatype's webcasts, giving technical presentations, and thinking on his feet in answering questions from our customers. I would welcome the opportunity to work with Blaine again!
…
See more

Dependable, Efficient, Go getter are all terms I'd use to describe Blaine. He knew our systems inside & out or knew how to find the answers. He was always there willing & ready to do what our team needed. He was great to work with.

received.text: Ralph is one of the best sales representatives I have ever had the pleasure of working with.  He is incredibly focused on the details that contribute to the success of his customers.  He possesses a very consultative approach to the sales process.  Rather than focus on the sale, Ralph is focused on the needs of the customer which results in outstanding results.  I would highly recommend Ralph to any sales organization and would welcome the opportunity to work with him again in the future.

Mike is an extremely hard-working and detail-oriented sales representative.  He possesses incredible drive and motivation that would be valuable to any sales organization.  Mike was always trying to understand the technology as deeply as possible in order to uncover additional sales opportunities.  I would welcome the opportunity to work with Mike again in the future.  Any organization would be extremely lucky to have Mike be a part of their team.

peopleAlsoViewed.text: Head of Americas at Anaplan, Inc.
Android Developer at It Works! Global
Emerging Technology Regional Sales Manager Financial Services at Red Hat
Global Talent Acquisition Specialist at MongoDB
